settings.text: Signe BV is the European sister company to Pure Ground Ingredients in the US, offering a full range of certified organic and fair trade botanicals, culinary herbs and spices to our European customers from our convenient location in the Netherlands.In compliance with organic European and German/BNN standards, Signe BV provides every organic and fair trade ingredient after verification and rigorous testing for pesticides including Glyphosate, micros, heavy metals, PAâ€™s, and other parameters as required. Signe BV is certified organic by Skal.From Holland we offer all organic ingredients treated and processed to your specs; including steam sterilization, milling & granulation, blending and roasting services as needed.Signe BV is a manifestation of the international commitment of Pure Ground Ingredients, USA and further establishes us as a global organic innovator.
